00029    template <class SystemType>
00030    class LinearPerturbation : public Perturbation
00031    {
00032    
00033    public:
00034 
00035       using Perturbation::getNParameters;
00036       using Perturbation::parameter;
00037       using Perturbation::derivative;
00038 
00048       LinearPerturbation(SystemType& system);
00049 
00053       virtual ~LinearPerturbation();
00054 
00058       virtual double difference(DArray<double> iPartnerParameter) const;
00059

00072    // Methods
00073 
00074    /*
00075    * Constructor. 
00076    */
00077    template <class SystemType>
00078    LinearPerturbation<SystemType>::LinearPerturbation(SystemType& system)
00079     : Perturbation(),
00080       systemPtr_(&system)
00081    {}
00082 
00083    template <class SystemType>
00084    LinearPerturbation<SystemType>::~LinearPerturbation()
00085    {}
00086 
00087    /*
00088    * Returns the difference W(partner) - W(current).
00089    */
00090    template <class SystemType>
00091    double LinearPerturbation<SystemType>::difference(DArray<double> iPartnerParameter) const
00092    {  
00093       int nParameters = getNParameters();
00094       double difference = 0.0;
00095       for (int i = 0; i < nParameters; ++i) {
00096          difference += (iPartnerParameter[i] - parameter(i)) * derivative(i); 
00097       }
00098       return difference;
00099    }
00100 
00101    /*
00102    * Return associated System by reference.
00103    */
00104    template <class SystemType>
00105    inline SystemType& LinearPerturbation<SystemType>::system() const
00106    {  return *systemPtr_; }
00107 
00108 }
